item.title: $EEM vs. $EMXC: Which Emerging Markets ETF is the Better Bet?
item.description: The core dilemma of emerging markets investing: to include China or not? This post provides an in-depth comparison of $EEM, a classic ETF that includes China, and $EMXC, which excludes it. Three characters debate the pros and cons of the traditional approach of embracing China’s risk versus the new strategy of avoiding ‘China risk’ and betting on the growth of India, Taiwan, and others.
